content: @Eric Wieser how do you think should the namespacing go? it would be consistent to have everything in WithLp, but then there is a very high likelyhood of naming clashes between the Pi and the Prod version of WithLp.
I would probably go with WithLp, but insert prod into the ambiguous names
@Jireh Loreaux Eric's WithLp changes are now included, so it is ready to review
